platform.summary: metagenomic and functional genomic analyses, intended for research and academic use
comments: MaAsLin - Multivariate Analysis by Linear Models
[PICRUSt](http://picrust.github.com/) - Phylogenetic Investigation of Communities by Reconstruction of Unobserved States
user_support: If you have any comments, questions, or suggestions, please contact the lab's dedicated forum at https://forum.biobakery.org/
quotas: The tools are available without account creation. However, you are strongly invited to create an account for having access to the history, saved analyses, datasets and workflows.
